alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 10:59PM MST until January 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts on the benches. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong cold front will bring a period of heavier snow Wednesday afternoon into early Wednesday evening. Snow squalls will be possible with this front, bringing strong winds and flash freezing conditions. Multiple additional rounds of snow are expected through the weekend.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
